publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-275 David Mundell: Road User Charging (Consultation and Publication) (Scotland) Regulations 2003â€”That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Road User Charging (Consultation and Publication) (Scotland) Regulations 2003 (SSI 2003/292).
